thread.title: Yahoo Serious: Whatever happened to the Young Einstein star?
thread.title_full: Yahoo Serious: Whatever happened to the Young Einstein star? | DailyTelegraph

author: Mathew Murphy and Network Writers
title: Yahoo Serious: Whatever happened to the Young Einstein star?
text:
AN AUSTRALIAN friend of mine here in New York recently went on a date with an American who wanted an answer to a burning question — whatever happened to Yahoo Serious?
“That is a question no Australian has asked in 20 years,” my friend informed her date.
It appears that Young Einstein , the 1988 hit movie written, directed and starring Serious, was played on high rotation here in the US and the actor even appeared on the cover of Time magazine.
Big time ... Yahoo Serious on the cover of Time magazine. Picture: Time
Married ... Yahoo Serious with then-wife, Lulu. Picture: Supplied
Beloved ... Yahoo Serious in a scene from 1988 film Young Einstein. Picture: Supplied
Short hair, don’t care ... The most recent picture of Yahoo Serious, from 2007, with then-wife, Lulu, at the Sydney Opera House for opening night of Pirates of Penzance. Picture: Supplied
Iconic scene ... Yahoo Serious in Young Einstein. Most people would remember this scene if not the entire movie. Picture: Supplied
1 of n
